newsitem.title: SLOVENIA: Slovenian port Luka to get Ljubljana listing.
newsitem.headline: Slovenian port Luka to get Ljubljana listing.

text.p: The Ljubljana bourse said on Thursday Slovenia's only port Luka Koper would list its shares on the primary market of the bourse, but no date had yet been set for the start of trading.
The company will list 4.66 million shares with a nominal value of 1,000 tolars, representing 33.3 percent of the firm's equity.
Luka will join a batch of 20 newly-privatised companies that have been listed on the primary and over-the-counter (OTC) markets of the Ljubljana bourse since the start of the year.
The bourse said it expected to list another 10 newly privatised firms by the end of this year. -- Marja Novak, Ljubljana newsroom, 386-61-125-8439
